Text:
Thanks for the 720p as always unopoleco.

Did you check out the subs to see if they are any good? I'm assuming these aren't by IceHunter.
oh thank you!
thank you SO MUCH!! i was just embarking on a major sulk-fest and i thought to myself, "literally the only thing that will make me feel better right now is new forbrydelsen..."
Thanks for the upload!
good to have you back! thank you
Thanks :-)
Thanks for the upload!
Many Thanks... great quality, and great subs on all episodes
The subs look to be usual professional standard
tak! tak! tak!
Thank you!:)))
Your work is appreciated. It's been frustrating, waiting longer, because each episode gets better and better. But, again, it is appreciated.

Velkommen tilbage unopoleco!

SkĂĽl! :)))
It's been worth the wait to get the quality product you post. many thanks Unopoleco...
Thank you Thank you Thank you!!!!!!!!!
Thank you Tak Tack thanks
thanks man :)
Thank you, thank you, thank you!

Thanks, for your effort. 

Just a sidenote though, don't get your hopes up, these subtitles are next to impossible to read, long lines of text are only shown for a very brief time... I thought I was a quick reader, but half of the dialogue did not reach me.
Yeah!!!!! Thanks @Unopoleco !

Subs are not as good as 1 thru 6 and I can confirm the comment above about long lines of text, perhaps shown a bit too briefly, however, all dialogue got thru to me.

So, not too bad, watchable, I guess the comment above is from a guy with low reading age.

To all who visit this page, this show is currently airing on BBC4 (UK) 2 episodes each Saturday night. I will wait for them to get to episode 7, 8, 9, 10 and download perfect BBC standard hardcoded subs via a very clever program called "get_iplayer", it is a command line based app but gets you beautiful DRM FREE mp4s, choice of three sizes, the largest of which is 1280x720.

If any of you want the really perfect hardcoded subs, BBC standard, look into getting this great program, rather then go to the shitty iplayer page and download a crappy DRM .wmv file.

For those outside of the UK, use a proxy or your VPN, if you don't know how to do that you are not worthy of owning a fucking computer in the 1st place.

http://www.addic7ed.com/serie/Forbrydelsen/3/8/Day_8
